experience: You and J.D. both know Chris Kitze, Dan Nienhauser, and 45 others
I can officially announce that I'm returning to...Atlanta!
I've accepted an Executive Producer job at WGCL-TV and start after Christmas.
Leaving @WTVM News Leader 9 / @WXTX Fox 54 was a difficult decision but this is an opportunity I couldn't pass up.

I'm incredibly proud of all the accomplishments we've made over my 2+ years here, like launching the market's 1st weekend AM newscast, 1st digital series, 1st breaking news / weather vehicle and 1st drone.
None of this would have been possible without a stellar staff and support from Raycom Media.
I'm forever grateful for the opportunity they gave me.
Detroit UnderS.T.R.E.S.S"Stop the Robberies, Enjoy Safe Streets" Premiers October 7th 2017
Lincoln Club Christmas party @Lincoln Club of San Diego County at the @US GRANT Hotel Congratulations president @Brian Pepin on a great turnout.  With @Karolyn Dorsee, @Ron Roberts
After three years of studio work at Newsmax HQ in South Florida, my new agreement allowed me to return to Arizona and to morning television, hosting a live two hour program Monday -Friday.

May, 2015 brings a move to prime time on Newsmax TV...I now host "Newsmax Prime," seen at 8pm, Eastern and again at 8pm, Pacific.Newsmax TV can be seen on Ch. 349 (DirecTV); Ch. 223 (Dish); Ch. 115 (Verizon FiOS); or via streaming video at the Newsmax TV website.

"America's Forum" can be seen live, Monday-Friday from 9am-Noon, Eastern/6-9am, Pacific on Newsmax TV (Channel 349 on DirecTV; Channel 223 on Dish).Utilizing over three decades of broadcast experience and twelve years as a Member of Congress, I offer insight, analysis, and opinion.
The Great 48th Group, LLC provides consulting services in communications and public policy based on my experience as a broadcaster and as a former Member of Congress.
Part of first GOP majority elected in forty years...first Arizonan to ever serve on the Ways and Means Committee.
Attended NCSU on an Athletic Grant-in-aid (football).

Robert Stryk
Proprietor, Robert Stryk Vineyards
August 29, 2013, J.D. was senior to Robert but didn’t manage directly

The Congressman gave me the opportunity of a lifetime. He gave a young kid from Scottsdale, Arizona the opportunity to live out his dream and work in the United States Congress. It was truly an honor of mine to work for such an amazing man. From the very first day I stepped into his office until the day I left, Congressman Hayworth always treated me with respect and dignity. Even though I was nothing more then an Intern, he always knew my name and I got the opportunity to witness a Man who was truly there to serve the people that elected him. I have been blessed with great success in my life both professionally and personally. That success is because of my time in Washington, D.C, and I will never forget that the Congressman and Trisha were the ones that gave me that initial opportunity. Congressman J.D. Hayworth needs no recommendations, but if anyone is looking for man of integrity and honor you could do no wrong in  working with the Congressman.

January 8, 2017, J.D. worked with Anne but at different companies

Anne Radley understands that "Public Relations" and "Branding" are not abstract concepts; in fact, she believes that both depend on a basic understanding of people.Anne brings passion, enthusiasm, and insight to her work...but most importantly, she always strives to truly understand the personal and professional goals of those with whom she works.I am pleased to recommend Anne and her work to you.JD Hayworth
